content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the easy to print pdf here - full page chart included the heart shaped cloth is a dishcloth a washcloth a coaster - and a cute way to spread love and cheer this valentine s day or any day i made the heart shaped cloth with red heart scrubby smoothie - it s one of my favorite cotton yarns but you could use lily sugar n cream to keep it dishy/washy or do something fun and textured for a coaster - or even hang them from a garland featuring the classic granny stitch it s a quick project and perfect for stash busting chart and written instructions included as well as right and left-handed video tutorials
